53.eng-name: The Book of Paradise, its Description, its Bounties and its Inhabitants

hadiths.text: Jabir b. Abdullah reported that Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said that the inmates of Paradise would eat therein and they would also drink, but they would neither void excrement, nor suffer catarrh, nor pass water, and their eating (would be digested) in the form of belching and their sweat would be musk aged they would glorify and praise Allah as easily ai you breathe

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي صِفَاتِ الْجَنَّةِ وَأَهْلِهَا وَتَسْبِيحِهِمْ فِيهَا بُكْرَةً وَعَشِيًّا
chapter.eng-name: The Attributes Of Paradise And Its People, And Their Glorifying Allah Every Morning And Evening
